thread.title: New erotic novel explores BDSM relationship
thread.title_full: New erotic novel explores BDSM relationship - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: New erotic novel explores BDSM relationship
text:
J.S. Danielle creates love between two wounded souls in ‘His Perfect One’
MIAMI (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
In search of the epitome of love, Devin – a wounded BDSM dominant – crosses paths with Aria, the perfect girl next door, in author J.S. Danielle ’s new erotic novel, “ His Perfect One ” (published by Trafford Publishing).
Devin is a master to women and lover of the female form until the one closest to him leaves. He dives headfirst into his work, leery of all things female. Angry, antisocial and a bit outspoken, he’s very protective of his heart and has all but given up on finding love.
Aria is beautiful, intelligent and feisty. She thought she had found her perfect man, but when it turns out she is sadly mistaken, she reaches out for a solution from her best friend who’s found solace in a local BDSM establishment. Can she be the perfect one to expose the large heart Devin has kept suppressed for more than five years?
“Even if you’ve never tried a quarter of the things discussed in the book, you’re drawn in and a willing participant in its hypnotism,” Danielle says. “The sex in this book isn’t raunchy or distasteful; it has a sense of passion and care a lot of erotic books do not.”
Danielle hopes readers will get to know her cast of characters – including their faults and issues – and fall in love with all of them.
“His Perfect One”
By J.S. Danielle
Softcover | 6 x 9 in | 240 pages | ISBN 9781490756660
E-Book | 240 pages | ISBN 9781490756653
Available at Amazon and Barnes & Noble
About the Author
J.S. Danielle is a South Miami native and a graduate of Florida State University. She is a mother of two girls. She is a lover of poetry and short stories. Being able to express herself in those media has been a love of hers for years. She loves the written word, believing in its power, influence, healing and information.
Trafford Publishing is an Author Solutions, LLC supported self-publishing services provider and was the first publisher in the world to offer an “on-demand publishing service” at its establishment in 1995. Trafford was also one of the earliest publishers to utilize the Internet for selling books. More than 10,000 authors from over 120 countries have utilized Trafford’s experience for self-publishing their books. For more information about Trafford Publishing, or to publish your book today, call 1-888-232-4444 or visit trafford.com.
